training_pairs: What is Ornament Tech?
Ornament Tech is luxury jewelry boutique specializing in bespoke jewelry creation We specialize in bespoke jewellery with editorial presentation and an AI concierge.
Tell me about your company
We are Ornament Tech with 15+ years of experience. We've created 1200+ pieces created for 500+ happy customers.
What are your values?
Our core values are Artistry, Partnership, Sustainability. These guide everything we do in creating exceptional jewelry.
How long have you been in business?
We have 15+ years of experience in bespoke jewelry creation.
How many customers have you served?
We've proudly served 500+ happy customers and created 1200+ pieces created.
How does the bespoke process work?
From concept to creation, a guided journey tailored to you Our process has 4 main steps: Consultation, Design, Craft, and Delivery.
How long does the bespoke process take?
The bespoke process 4-8 weeks depending on complexity.
What happens in the consultation?
Step 1 - Consultation: Share your vision and story with our designers. We'll discuss your budget, timeline, and unique inspirations to create the perfect foundation for your piece.
Tell me about the design phase
Step 2 - Design: Watch your dreams take shape through hand-drawn sketches and 3D CAD models. We'll refine every detail together until the design is perfect.
How is my jewelry crafted?
Step 3 - Craft: Our master craftspeople bring your design to life using traditional techniques and modern precision. Every piece is handmade with exceptional attention to detail.
When will I receive my jewelry?
Step 4 - Delivery: Your completed masterpiece undergoes rigorous quality checks before being presented in our signature packaging. The moment you've been waiting for.
Tell me about Engagement Rings
Engagement Rings: Solitaire classics, vintage-inspired halos, and completely custom designs to mark your unique love story. We have 50+ designs available, starting From £2,500.
What engagement rings do you have?
Our Engagement Rings collection includes Solitaire, Halo, Trilogy, Custom designs. Solitaire classics, vintage-inspired halos, and completely custom designs to mark your unique love story.
How much for engagement rings?
Engagement Rings start From £2,500. Prices vary based on materials and complexity.
Tell me about Wedding Bands
Wedding Bands: Perfectly paired bands in classic, textured, and shaped styles. Each designed to complement your engagement ring. We have 40+ designs available, starting From £800.
What wedding bands do you have?
Our Wedding Bands collection includes Classic, Shaped, Textured, Bespoke fits. Perfectly paired bands in classic, textured, and shaped styles. Each designed to complement your engagement ring.
How much for wedding bands?
Wedding Bands start From £800. Prices vary based on materials and complexity.
Tell me about Necklaces
Necklaces: Delicate pendants to statement pieces, each featuring carefully selected gemstones and precious metals. We have 35+ designs available, starting From £1,200.
What necklaces do you have?
Our Necklaces collection includes Pendants, Statement designs, Precious stones. Delicate pendants to statement pieces, each featuring carefully selected gemstones and precious metals.
How much for necklaces?
Necklaces start From £1,200. Prices vary based on materials and complexity.
Tell me about Earrings
Earrings: From elegant studs for everyday wear to dramatic drops for special occasions, crafted with precision. We have 45+ designs available, starting From £600.
What earrings do you have?
Our Earrings collection includes Studs, Hoops, Drops, Precious metals. From elegant studs for everyday wear to dramatic drops for special occasions, crafted with precision.
How much for earrings?
Earrings start From £600. Prices vary based on materials and complexity.
Tell me about Bridal Collection
Bridal Collection: Complete bridal sets designed to complement each other perfectly for your special day. We have 25+ sets available, starting From £3,500.
What bridal collection do you have?
Our Bridal Collection collection includes . Complete bridal sets designed to complement each other perfectly for your special day.
How much for bridal collection?
Bridal Collection start From £3,500. Prices vary based on materials and complexity.
Tell me about Heritage Collection
Heritage Collection: Timeless pieces inspired by classical designs, updated with contemporary craftsmanship. We have 30+ designs available, starting From £1,800.
What heritage collection do you have?
Our Heritage Collection collection includes . Timeless pieces inspired by classical designs, updated with contemporary craftsmanship.
How much for heritage collection?
Heritage Collection start From £1,800. Prices vary based on materials and complexity.
Tell me about Platinum

Platinum: The ultimate choice for luxury jewelry. Naturally white, hypoallergenic, and incredibly durable. Platinum develops a beautiful patina over time while maintaining its strength. Key properties: Hypoallergenic, Naturally White, Extremely Durable, Develops Patina.
What are the benefits of Platinum?
Platinum offers Hypoallergenic, Naturally White, Extremely Durable, Develops Patina. It's best for Engagement rings, daily wear.
How durable is Platinum?
Platinum has Highest durability and requires Minimal maintenance.
Tell me about 18K Yellow Gold

18K Yellow Gold: Classic and timeless with a warm, rich hue. Perfect balance of purity and durability, making it ideal for everyday wear and heirloom pieces. Key properties: Classic Beauty, Excellent Durability, Warm Tone, Traditional Choice.
What are the benefits of 18K Yellow Gold?
18K Yellow Gold offers Classic Beauty, Excellent Durability, Warm Tone, Traditional Choice. It's best for Classic pieces, heirlooms.
How durable is 18K Yellow Gold?
18K Yellow Gold has High durability and requires Low maintenance.
Tell me about 18K White Gold

18K White Gold: Contemporary elegance with a bright, silvery finish. Rhodium-plated for extra brilliance, though periodic re-plating may be recommended. Key properties: Modern Appeal, Rhodium Finished, Bright Appearance, Versatile Choice.
What are the benefits of 18K White Gold?
18K White Gold offers Modern Appeal, Rhodium Finished, Bright Appearance, Versatile Choice. It's best for Modern designs, versatility.
How durable is 18K White Gold?
18K White Gold has High durability and requires Moderate maintenance.
Tell me about 18K Rose Gold

18K Rose Gold: Romantic and distinctive with its beautiful blush tone created by copper alloys. Increasingly popular for its unique warmth and vintage appeal. Key properties: Romantic Tone, Unique Character, Vintage Appeal, Growing Popularity.
What are the benefits of 18K Rose Gold?
18K Rose Gold offers Romantic Tone, Unique Character, Vintage Appeal, Growing Popularity. It's best for Romantic pieces, vintage styles.
How durable is 18K Rose Gold?
18K Rose Gold has High durability and requires Low maintenance.
Tell me about Diamonds
Diamonds: Understand the 4Cs: cut, color, clarity, carat. The most precious and durable gemstone. Key characteristics: 4Cs evaluation, Exceptional hardness, Brilliant fire, Timeless appeal.
What makes Diamonds special?
Diamonds are valued for 4Cs evaluation, Exceptional hardness, Brilliant fire, Timeless appeal.
Tell me about Sapphires
Sapphires: Durable corundum in a range of colors. Second only to diamonds in hardness. Key characteristics: Available in many colors, Excellent durability, Royal heritage, Symbolic meaning.
What makes Sapphires special?
Sapphires are valued for Available in many colors, Excellent durability, Royal heritage, Symbolic meaning.
Tell me about Emeralds
Emeralds: Vibrant green beryl with unique inclusions that add character and authenticity. Key characteristics: Vivid green color, Natural inclusions, Requires gentle care, Historic significance.
What makes Emeralds special?
Emeralds are valued for Vivid green color, Natural inclusions, Requires gentle care, Historic significance.
Tell me about Rubies
Rubies: Rich red corundum prized for its intensity and passion. Key characteristics: Intense red color, Excellent hardness, Symbol of love, Rare and valuable.
What makes Rubies special?
Rubies are valued for Intense red color, Excellent hardness, Symbol of love, Rare and valuable.
How do I book a consultation?
You can book a In-Person Consultation, Virtual Video Call, Phone Consultation. We offer Free consultation and typical sessions last 60-90 minutes.
Where are your locations?
We have locations in London Studio, Cambridge Boutique. Our main studio is in 69 Regent's Park Road, Primrose Hill, London NW1 8UY.
Do you offer virtual consultations?
Yes! We offer In-Person Consultation, Virtual Video Call, Phone Consultation. Virtual consultations are a great way to start your bespoke journey from anywhere.
What should I expect in a consultation?
During your consultation: Discovery session to understand your vision Design exploration and material selection Detailed proposal with timeline and pricing.
What are your prices?
Our prices vary by collection: Engagement rings from £2,500, Wedding bands from £800, Necklaces from £1,200, Earrings from £600. We work with all budgets.
Do you offer payment plans?
Yes, we offer Full payment, Payment plans, Deposit system, Financing available to make your dream piece more accessible.
Is there a consultation fee?
No, we offer Free consultation. All initial consultations are complimentary.
What are typical lead times?
Bespoke projects typically take 4–8 weeks depending on complexity. Simple modifications may take 2-3 weeks, while completely custom pieces with rare gemstones can take up to 12 weeks.
Do you resize rings?
Yes, we offer comprehensive resizing services. Most rings can be resized up or down by 2-3 sizes. Complex designs with intricate details may have limitations, which we'll discuss during consultation.
What's a typical budget for bespoke jewelry?

Budgets vary widely based on materials and design complexity. Engagement rings start from £2,500, while elaborate custom pieces can range from £5,000 to £50,000+. We work with all budgets to create something special.
Do you provide certificates for gemstones?
Yes, all our diamonds come with GIA or similar certification. Colored gemstones receive appropriate certifications from recognized gemological laboratories.
What is your return policy?
Bespoke pieces are custom-made for you and generally cannot be returned. However, we offer unlimited revisions during the design phase and a satisfaction guarantee on craftsmanship.
How can I contact you?
You can reach us at hello@ornamenttech.com, call +44 20 8154 9500, or use our WhatsApp. We respond within 24 hours.
What are your hours?
We're available Monday to Saturday, 9 AM to 6 PM. You can also reach us anytime through our AI concierge.
Do you have social media?
Yes! Follow us on Instagram @ornamenttech, Facebook OrnamentTech, and Pinterest OrnamentTech.
How do I care for my jewelry?
Clean gently with warm water and mild soap. Store in individual pouches to prevent scratching. We recommend annual professional check-ups.
Do you offer repairs?
Yes, we offer comprehensive repair services, resizing, cleaning, and maintenance. We provide a lifetime guarantee on our craftsmanship.
Can you resize my ring?
Yes, we offer resizing services. Most rings can be resized up or down by 2-3 sizes, though complex designs may have limitations.
